snippet: The Justice Department investigates claims of bribery at The Wall Street Journal, Barry Diller’s Aereo could change the game in television, and the case of Matthew Keys highlights problems with hacking laws.
abstract: The Justice Department investigates claims of bribery at The Wall Street Journal, Barry Diller’s Aereo could change the game in television, and the case of Matthew Keys highlights problems with hacking laws.

headline.main: The Breakfast Meeting: Bribery Inquiry at The Journal, and Taking Aim at Cable TV
